text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ――Oh, you came at just the right time.
During a lunch break, I was walking around school when I ran in to Mejiro Ramonu.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Would you mind modeling for my Croquis drawing?
If I recall, Croquis was usually a 『Simple sketch in a short amount of time』. Basically to create a 『Snapshot』 of rough shapes and movements.
choice_data_list: So, abstract isn't your only style
So, abstract isn't your only style

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……Of course it isn't.
I happened to notice another drawing board leaning against a tree. You could tell she was skilled at just a glance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: What?
There were several pictures stacked together. They were very realistic, and strangely, you could almost feel the atmosphere coming from them……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Are you finished yet?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: A perfect tableau, requires perfect scrutiny.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: With only passion, love just becomes ego. Races are the same……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Alright……over there.
『Change poses every 30 seconds』 is what she said as she set the alarm on her smartphone and started drawing.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……observing is more important than drawing. Take a look……
What she showed me was multiple human-shaped figures drawn with simple lines. Eyes and noses were barely drawn and the faces only had two intersecting lines.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Is that so? ――We're continuing.
――And now we were about 20 poses in. We should be almost done, right……?
I didn't really know much about drawing anyways. After thinking for a bit, a few ideas came to mind, based on paintings I had seen before……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh, that's………… Heh……
It was a pose from a painting about races done by a famous painter from my hometown. I fell in love with it the moment I saw it in some local official building.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Hmmmm……I love it too. That painting.
I couldn't help but speak passionately. The painting was not only beautiful, but it was about the racing world. Each brush stroke was beautiful――!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: …………I see.
Before I realized it, Mejiro Ramonu had packed up her tools as the afternoon bell rang.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: It's fine? I don't see an issue……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: With that kind of love……
However, several days after that. While we were discussing the schedule as usual――

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: ……So, you won't be here on these days.
choice_data_list: Heading back home for a bit

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: Oh, I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ramonu
text_block_list.text: I don't know where it is but……it must be far, huh.
I just told her about my hometown recently too. But for her, I guess it was something unimportant.
But that didn't matter. Just being together because we had the same aspirations was enough……!
